name: ASSEMBLIA
description:
Take up arms and rise against the evil monarch!  Fight against an array of bizarre, 80s toys inspired enemies!

Our hero needs to find their way out of this foreign land Assemblia! They have a secret weapon, however! The ability to take the arms of their defeated foes and use them for themselves!

Assemblia is a toy city with all of its residents being toys. The city is oppressed by the mean and evil toy-emperor and his cruel ministers. Our hero gets caught up in the circumstances and tries to change the world by overthrowing the current regime.

Our HeroThe MentorTumbalf the ThiefThey are stranded in Assemblia, but they were  granted the ability to equip the arms of their foe.She found and trained the hero, helped them navigate the dire world of Assemblia.A taste of what power the monarch holds, this common thief was graced with immense power.
